champ_0240_system_01: Are you ready to face Larry of the Elite Four?
champ_0240_fly_01: So, you made it this far.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_02:
I serve as a member of the Elite Four too, yes...
Unfortunately for me.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_03:
At my Gym, I use Normal-type Pokémon, since
I feel they have a lot in common with me.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_04:
But, well, the boss told me to use a different
type here.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_05:
So if you have any complaints, please take them
up with La Primera.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_06: Anyway, time to get to work.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_07:
You’re a lot stronger than I recall. No wonder
La Primera likes you.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_fly_08:
Now then... I suppose the final member of the
Elite Four is next.[npcn:15]
champ_0240_ground_01: Uh... Don’t think he heard you, Larry.[npcn:13]
champ_0240_ground_02:
Larry, you...you may need to speak up just a
little bit more.[npcn:13]
champ_0240_dragon_00:
[BD06:0]Hello there, [trnm:0].
It delights\r
me\r
to\r
see\r
you here.[npcn:12]
champ_0240_dragon_01:
As for you, Larry... I see you made Rika do the
shouting again, hm?[npcn:12]
champ_0240_ground_04:
Hassel’s the Elite Four’s last line of defense.
I can’t wait to see how you’ll take him on![npcn:13]
champ_0240_steel_01: It’s super amazing you defeated Mr. Larry![npcn:14]
champ_0240_fly_14:
...I get the feeling I’m in for another one of
Hassel’s endless lectures.[npcn:15]
